scripts.build: npm i && cd frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.cy:open:dev: npm run mongodb:restart && cypress open  --browser chrome
scripts.mongodb:restart: docker stop test-mongo && docker rm test-mongo && docker run -d -p 27017:27017 --name test-mongo mongo:latest
scripts.cy:run:dev: npm run mongodb:restart && npm run data:testuser && npm run data:generate && cypress run
scripts.cy:run: npm run data:testuser && npm run data:generate && cypress run
